moves.1... d5 2. c4: I decide to speed up a very slow opening.
moves.2... dxc4 3. Bxc4: White is ahead in development, and space.
moves.3... e5 4. Qb3 Nh6 5. Nf3: I put some more pressure on the center.
moves.5... Qd7: (??) Black ignores the knight better would probably be Bd6, or e4. Now, I have an idea for a combo. Black lets me take a tempo, and a pawn.
moves.6. Nxe5 Qd8: I decide to open a diagonal for my queen, and take a pawn.
moves.7. Bxf7+ Nxf7: (??) Ke7 would have been the only response.
